item.description: Come race on this fast track outside in the fresh air. For the armchair video gamers amongst us, its the perfect video game-like activity without feeling guilty about being indoors. One thing I wanted to let you know is that this track has something called an open lapping session, where you pay $70 for half an hour of racing. Also you get to race on a bigger circuit than you normally would. The normal race prices are $28, $56, $75 for 1,2,3 races respectively plus licence fees.
item.how_to_find_us: My pic is on this site - I will be around the area you get your race passes from
item.name: F1 outdoors - try 2
